title: Pixel 3XL Bluetooth and WiFi stopped working.
content: After hours of trying *everything* I could find on this subject on this forum, as a last ditch effort, I turned on Hotspot. Why is it that it's always the last thing you try that fixes it? If you are stuck, too, try that. Let the community know if this helps you.
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3 XL
